Text:

could we have a 720p / 1080p release please ?

This rip is 720 x 376 pixels. Norwegian subtitles are NOT burned in, as stated above. This first release of DVD and Blue-Ray does not include English subtitles, only Nordic. 
"majalogan" will have to wait for a possible international release.
